text:
In the "Dependency Changes" section of the RELEASE-NOTES.txt it states:

Tomcat 6.0 is designed to run on JSE 5.0 and later, and requires
configuration to run on JSE 5.0.

Tomcat 6.0 does not require any additional configuration to run on JSE 5.0.
creator: asfbugzilla@thelinuxshack.com

text: I am unclear on the issue. Please reopen with a patch with new wording.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
